Articles.Content: Does any mods have Translation plans after the new lokalisation update

I'm certainly planning to look at doing it.

The catch is all my mods also need updating to the new UI still and I'm actually rewriting my oldest mod from scratch as the crazy code I keep coming across in it got to me and I can't take it anymore.

So any updates on this front are going to be slow, but I'm planning to.

D.
